name: ExchangeRate-API
description: Free currency conversion API for all 160 world currencies. Tens of thousands of developers have picked ExchangeRate-API.com over the last 10 years for its reliable data & exceptional uptime - give it a try!

api_methods.name: Latest Rates
api_methods.description:
This endpoint returns the latest exchange rates for the base currency code you have supplied.

You can view the list of supported currency codes here: [https://www.exchangerate-api.com/docs/supported-currencies](https://www.exchangerate-api.com/docs/supported-currencies)

utterances.utterance: What are the latest exchange rates for the Euro?
Can you show me the current exchange rates for the British Pound?
I need the latest currency rates for the Japanese Yen.
What’s the current exchange rate for the Australian Dollar?
Could you provide the latest rates for the Canadian Dollar?
Show me the most recent exchange rates for the Swiss Franc.
What are the current rates for the Chinese Yuan?
Can you fetch the latest exchange rates for the Indian Rupee?
I’d like to see the latest currency rates for the Mexican Peso.
What’s the latest exchange rate for the New Zealand Dollar?
